about_the_game:
The "story" and "texts" are puzzle!

This is a cat puzzle game where you use "text" to push the cat. If letter WASD appears in the text, you can push it! You need to push the cat to the goal.

About the Puzzle

Don't worry if you can't solve the puzzle. There are in-game hints and solutions.

About the Story

Do You push cats often?

Cat pushing experts believes that it is good for mental health if you push cats every now and then.
However, pushing cats is a challenging task. It requires perseverance, patience, and determination. Be prepared physically, mentally and emotionally!
By pushing the cat, you are pushing the cat to think, to remember why they are stuck in this game...

"Push the Cat with WASD" is definitely one of the games ever made!
This "game" will try to answer some of the deepest philosophical questions that are very important to humanity and our everyday life, for example:

  • Why push cat?
  • Why is cat here?
  • What if you can’t push the cat? (Oh no!)
  • What is the goal of the cat?
  • What is the name of the cat? (Spoilers: It is Push)
  • Why is cat there?
  • What is the conversion of consciousness?
  • What is the conversion of consciousness?
  • What is the conversion of consciousness?

More About this Game

This is a game from GMTK Game Jam 2023 with the theme "roles reversed".

name: Push The Cat with WASD Demo
short_description: A cat-pushing puzzle game where narratives are puzzle levels. With an emotional story and a little bit of 4th wall breaking. By pushing the cat, you are pushing the cat to think, to remember why they are stuck in this game...
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
